name: Minute Mountaineers
description:
Note: due to a strange bug in the HTML5 version which prevented me from implementing a slightly better way to check collisions, the Windows build contains a very slightly better experience.

A 2-player local action game. Player 1 (red) uses the A and D keys, and Player 2 (blue) moves with left and right arrow keys.

It's a race to the top! You have 1 minute to climb to the summit of the mountain, or at least to get higher than your opponent. Move left and right to bounce your way up using platforms - or your opponent's head!
